Pre-Game Insights: Chicago Bulls are aiming for their 4th consecutive home win.
Washington Wizards are struggling with a 6-29 record and a poor defense allowing the most points in the league.
Nikola Vucevic and Jordan Poole are highlighted as key performers.
Chicago has a 9-14 record against teams over.500, while Washington is 5-18 against Eastern Conference opponents.
Others: The game is part of the NBA schedule for January 11, 2025.
Both teams have several injuries to consider.
